name: Somnia
description: Somnia is an EVM-compatible Layer 1 blockchain designed to support high-performance, real-time applications across gaming, metaverse, and social ecosystems. Built with scalability and composability in mind, Somnia enables developers to deploy smart contracts that can interact seamlessly within persistent virtual environments. Its novel MultiStream architecture separates execution, data availability, and consensus into distinct layers, allowing the network to process over one million transactions per second with sub-second finality. This structure supports complex, high-frequency interactions on-chain while minimizing congestion and cost. Somniaâ€™s infrastructure aims to provide the foundational layer for immersive, decentralized digital experiences that require fast, synchronized, and cost-efficient performance at scale.
